Contact

You may contact me through my email, vitorsudbrack@gmail.com, or my institutional email vitor.sudbrack@unil.ch.

You can find me on social media, especially Twitter, to be updated about my researches. You can find me on GoogleScholar, OrcID or ResearchGate, and Brazilian researches can also find me on Lattes Platform.
